short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Advanced DexScreener token filtering chrome extension with real-time alerts, plus Solana token security checks via RugCheck API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DexScreener Plus Solana Filter & Token Security Checker

Experience the ultimate tool for crypto trading and token research with DexScreener Plus. This Chrome extension offers advanced token filtering, real-time alerts, and comprehensive Solana security checks to empower your trading decisions.

Key Features:
Advanced Token Filters:
Filter tokens directly on the DexScreener home page by symbol or public key. Whether you’re researching new tokens or looking for a specific one, DexScreener Plus streamlines your search process.

Real-Time Alerts:
Set up sound alerts for new token listings based on your chosen symbol or address. Get notified instantly with a popup and sound when a matching token is detected, ensuring you never miss an opportunity, even when multitasking across different tabs.

Solana Token Security Checker:
Evaluate the safety of any Solana token using the RugCheck API before investing. Instantly assess critical factors, including:

Developer control over the supply.
Minting and freeze authority status.
Potential risks and security warnings.
New Feature:
Instant Token Page Notifications – When you enter a token page on DexScreener, you’ll receive an immediate notification indicating whether the token is likely a rug pull (danger) or deemed safe (good to go). This helps you make informed decisions at a glance, protecting your investments.

Paid Token Check:
Identify whether the token has paid for placement on DexScreener to better assess its legitimacy.

All-in-One Tool for Crypto Traders:
Ensure you're investing in safe tokens and stay informed about potential risks. Whether you need advanced token filtering or security checks for Solana tokens, DexScreener Plus provides a seamless, all-in-one solution for smarter, safer trading.

Why Choose This Extension?
This extension is perfect for crypto traders and enthusiasts who want to stay ahead in a fast-paced market. It offers an unmatched blend of token monitoring, security analysis, and real-time notifications to enhance your research and trading strategy.
